title: Divisional Playoff preview
itunes:title: Divisional Playoff preview
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- preview the four games in the Divisional Playoffs by revealing their picks and scores. Plus, Marc Sessler defends his hero pick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
